item.title: The Centre for Excellence in Taxation has been launched by Singapore Management University
item.description:
Singapore Management University (SMU) has partnered with the Tax Academy of Singapore and the Inland Revenue Authority of Singapore to establish the SMU-TA Centre for Excellence in Taxation (SMU-TA CET). This groundbreaking research center is the first of its kind in Singapore. The SMU-TA CET signifies a substantial step towards investigating international and regional tax matters and policies. Its primary goal is to generate comprehensive research in these areas to inform policy development...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-centre-for-excellence-in-taxation-has-been-launched-by-singapore-management-university/
